user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (contact@marketminds.com) with the customer data we need for our analysis, and remind her to check her work notes in Notion for the information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Customer Data for Upcoming Analysis

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send over the customer data we need for our next engagement analysis at your earliest convenience? When you have a moment, kindly check your work notes in Notion—everything we need should be outlined there.

Please email the data directly to contact@marketminds.com. Let me know if you have any questions or need clarification on the specific datasets.

Thanks so much for your help!

Best regards,
[Your Name]
MarketMinds Inc.

final_output:
